desc: Step by step guide with working example of server and client with hot-reloading and SSR with Webpack (in development).
How to test actions, reducers, components?
Notes about SUI. Why SUIR is a good (or bad) choise.
How i18n is implemented and how to customize it.
Webpack configuration for server/client in production and development.
Docs about every npm script and ENV variable.
Why this folder structure and how to adapt it in own project.
